## Source: ossf-package-analysis (15cce6ca7d9ce0af312425dec9ae608529c322b940526b20135cdcd8673ba31c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'matplotlib-flask' @ 7.15.10 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
